name: Fullarm
0:
”Alexa, arm Panel”
”Alexa, turn on Room light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With that skill you can arm parcial and disarm your panel and execute automations using the configured phrases at the Fullarm's platform. To do this, you'll need Fullarm's user and password to link your account with Alexa.

Here some exemples of how to do this:

Alexa, arm Home
Alexa, turn off Room light

You can use too the shortcuts registered at the Fullarm:
Alexa, turn on <Shortcut registered at the Fullarm>

Exemple:
Alexa, turn on arriving home
Alexa, turn on lights
